name: Farstorm
description: Farstorm is a 3D Action Anime RPG (AARPG) where you control Kazuko, an elven princess which has a tyrant father. Go back in time and stop your father from taking the throne, even if it costs you your life, for the people of Farstorm!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950FTW DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
